thread.section_title: Sling TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sling TV | sling.com
thread.title: Gerry Hertzberg
thread.title_full: Sling TV reviewed by Gerry Hertzberg

author: Gerry Hertzberg
title: Gerry Hertzberg
text: Sling was a horrible experience for me. I have a newer Macbook pro and latest OS. IT kept crashing. They could not fix the problem but they know they have OSX problems. Whats really bad is that they refuse to give a refund even though they know it does not work on OSX horrible company
